description: Features future-proof USB 3.0 and USB 2.0 connectivity (both cables included). Latest firmware with USB Attached SCSI support for maximum performance. Open docking bay for easy dock/undock of bare/internal SATA drives. Connect a single 3.5" or 2.5" SATA drive at SuperSpeed USB 3.0 transfer rates (up to 10x as fast as USB 2.0). Backward compatible with USB 2.0 and 1.1 at their native speeds. Practical transfer rates with USB 3.0 will vary by machine, typically between 500Mbps and 2Gbps.Simple SATA drive dockLightweight (7.6 oz) and simple design so it's easy to connect and use. Simply slide drives gently into top of docking station, with SATA connectors aligned. Do not exert force. Drives will attach and rest on the SATA connector with the drive centered in the dock, with space for airflow on all sides.Power button for powering off drive when not in use.No drivers required: uses standard USB mass storage class support already provided in Windows XP and later, Mac, and Linux. LED reports drive activity. Power switch allows drive to be turned on/off independently.In the boxUSB 3.0 to SATA HDD Docking Station (using ASMedia 1051E Chipset), USB 3.0 Cable, USB 2.0 cable, 12V/2A AC power adapter.
title: Plugable USB 3.0/2.0 SATA Hard Drive Docking Station (ASMedia Chipset; UASP and 3TB+ Support)
